# Pony Express Mallorca

> Pony hire in Mallorca for birthday parties and events: children enjoy a day riding ponies in Palma and across the island. Home service or at our farm.

Pony Express Mallorca offers pony rental (alquiler de ponis) in Mallorca, Spain, for birthday parties, first communions, and other events. Services can be at the customer's venue (home, garden, restaurant) or at the farm in Palma de Mallorca. Contact: +34 619 86 18 80. Website available in Spanish (default) and English.
